title: Wounded by Her
description: **Mature Content Warning** Recommended for ages 17+ due to language,sexual content and explicit drug references. They say that every story has two sides. This is my storyI grew up in the suburbs of Atlanta with a loving mother and father that have been married since high school. I also grew up knowing I wanted to find that same love. I wanted the All American Dream; a loving wife, 2.5 kids, a dog and a nice house in the country -- not the suburbs of Atlanta.I fell in love with her the minute I saw her standing outside my patrol car. She was placating her friends on a dare. Jordan had no idea that her actions provoked a fire that would last forever.I knew that day she would be MINE. I had no idea what it would end up taking to get her and the damage that would be done in the process.Wounded by Her is Book 2 in the SCARS SERIES
author: C.R. Gress
